content: Yes, Four Roses Distillery offers tours and tastings, and you can try out their different recipes. They offer a standard tour which includes a guided tour of the distillery, a walkthrough of the barrel warehouses, and a tasting of their bourbons, including some of their limited edition releases. You can also take a more in-depth tour, which includes a visit to their tasting lab and a comparative tasting of their different bourbons. During the tour, you can learn about their blending process and the unique flavors of their different recipes. Reservations are recommended, so be sure to check their website for more information and to book your tour.
